Comment on the short & long term impact of free trade on economic development of developing countries such as India.

In current scenario,where most of the brands are from outside India are palying vital role in developing the taste & trend in our country.It is very common to see that the people from india were prefer to purchase from foreign brands as compared to the local brands even though they are cheap in prices in comparison with foreign brands in India.Free trade policy also contributing towards the growth of economy in developing countries such as India by making our brands available in foreign markets easily.By trading freely with our neighbouring countries,we are also establishing a good relationship with them for our near future.Trading with the foreign countries also involves the exchange of currency which will impact the economic growth of a country.Free trade policy enable us to know the culture,customs,living styles & the ways of growth in our neighbouring countries.Last but not the least free trade policy always contribute to raise the level of  economic development in developing countries like India,Pakistan etc.
